GT.content: why desire to interrupt circulation of circle, why desire the gift?
GT.linkedContent: why desire to interrupt circulation of circle, why desire the gift?

GT.content: demand of gift/countergift, circulatory differance, requirement of restitution “at term,” delayed “due date,” thing itself demands gift & restitution
GT.linkedContent: demand of gift/countergift, circulatory differance, requirement of restitution “at term,” delayed “due date,” thing itself demands gift & restitution

GT.content: demand for term & temporization, very structure of the thing, demand for limit, boundary, margin, a demand which dawns in gift-counter-gift
GT.linkedContent: demand for term & temporization, very structure of the thing, demand for limit, boundary, margin, a demand which dawns in gift-counter-gift

GT.content: subject as such: bordered, posed, identified, always calculates, reappropriates surplus-value, circular return, a certain capitalization
GT.linkedContent: subject as such: bordered, posed, identified, always calculates, reappropriates surplus-value, circular return, a certain capitalization

GT.content: despite labor of subject, production of surplus-value, gift takes place where there’s trace, dissemination, in excessive forgetting, forgetful excess of the gift
GT.linkedContent: despite labor of subject, production of surplus-value, gift takes place where there’s trace, dissemination, in excessive forgetting, forgetful excess of the gift

GT.content: [via psychoanalysis] circulation of auto-affective fantasmatics [imaginative incorporation] can disregard overflow of luxury or recognize in it an essential economic function
GT.linkedContent: [via psychoanalysis] circulation of auto-affective fantasmatics [imaginative incorporation] can disregard overflow of luxury or recognize in it an essential economic function

GT.content: laws turn gift into exchange, economy, contractual circulation, (distributive) justice
violence of gift: takes by surprise in such a way as to trap, indebt the receiver, place, hold in a process of circulation, but this violence irreducible whether it repeats or interrupts the circle
GT.linkedContent: violence of gift: takes by surprise in such a way as to trap, indebt the receiver, place, hold in a process of circulation, but this violence irreducible whether it repeats or interrupts the circle

GT.content: or: a surprise surprising enough to be forgotten w/out delay, beyond Being, epekeina tes ousia: secret about which one cannot speak, but can no longer remain silent
GT.linkedContent: or: a surprise surprising enough to be forgotten w/out delay, beyond Being, epekeina tes ousia: secret about which one cannot speak, but can no longer remain silent

OOG.content: maintenance of circulation permits neutralization of worldly history
OOG.linkedContent: maintenance of circulation permits neutralization of worldly history

OOG.content: when investigating origins of geometry, decidability is reduced, along w/ each determined factual stage of history > to indicate the pure openness and unity of an infinite horizon [capitalism, Levinas’ Being]
OOG.linkedContent: when investigating origins of geometry, decidability is reduced, along w/ each determined factual stage of history > to indicate the pure openness and unity of an infinite horizon [capitalism, Levinas’ Being]

OOG.content: can never keep sedimentary deposits out of circulation
OOG.linkedContent: can never keep sedimentary deposits out of circulation

OOG.content: for Husserl, absolute is passage (historicity as passage of Speech, primordial Logos toward polar Telos)
OOG.linkedContent: for Husserl, absolute is passage (historicity as passage of Speech, primordial Logos toward polar Telos)

OOG.content: every return to the origin, an audacious move toward the origin (circulation, anticipation)
OOG.linkedContent: every return to the origin, an audacious move toward the origin (circulation, anticipation)

AF.content: [re: Yerushalmi] he doesn’t mean to give but to give back, a masterly decipherment, give back to Freud his own competence [to read Hebrew]
AF.linkedContent: [re: Yerushalmi] he doesn’t mean to give but to give back, a masterly decipherment, give back to Freud his own competence [to read Hebrew]

POR.content: in French, Leibniz’s reddere rationem is rendre raison de quelque chose, does that mean reason is owed? it gives rise to circulation?
POR.linkedContent: in French, Leibniz’s reddere rationem is rendre raison de quelque chose, does that mean reason is owed? it gives rise to circulation?

PP.content: Plato’s scriptural “metaphor” intervenes whenever difference and relation are irreducible, every time otherness introduces determination and puts a system into circulation
PP.linkedContent: Plato’s scriptural “metaphor” intervenes whenever difference and relation are irreducible, every time otherness introduces determination and puts a system into circulation

PAS.content: no circulation, no dialectic, can close itself (se refermer) on (sur) a determinable quantity of forces
PAS.linkedContent: no circulation, no dialectic, can close itself (se refermer) on (sur) a determinable quantity of forces

O.content: dissemination disrupts circulation that turns after-affect of meaning into an origin [Marx’s commodity?]
O.linkedContent: dissemination disrupts circulation that turns after-affect of meaning into an origin [Marx’s commodity?]

O.content: le détour d’une écriture dont one ne revient pas, dissemination: this question calls for restaging of arithmos, “counting” as “bad procedure,” and rereading the rhythmos of Democritus, which philosophy has never been able to reckon w/ (n’aura pu compter) > philosophy accounts for itself by rising out of, and then circulating w/in its speculative necessity, the [envelope of writing]
O.linkedContent: le détour d’une écriture dont one ne revient pas, dissemination: this question calls for restaging of arithmos, “counting” as “bad procedure,” and rereading the rhythmos of Democritus, which philosophy has never been able to reckon w/ (n’aura pu compter) > philosophy accounts for itself by rising out of, and then circulating w/in its speculative necessity, the [envelope of writing]

RGE.content: conservation of Aufhebung: circulation & self-reproduction as reproduction of meaning
RGE.linkedContent: conservation of Aufhebung: circulation & self-reproduction as reproduction of meaning

RGE.content: Aufhebung amortizes absolute expenditure (la dépense absolue), works the “putting at stake” into an investment (à élaborer la mise en jeu en investissement) > it’s laughable
RGE.linkedContent: Aufhebung amortizes absolute expenditure (la dépense absolue), works the “putting at stake” into an investment (à élaborer la mise en jeu en investissement) > it’s laughable

RGE.content: phenomenology of mind (phenomenology in general) correspond to restricted economy, restricted to commercial values, “science dealing w/ utilization of wealth”: circuit of reproductive consumption, limited to established value of objects and their circulation
RGE.linkedContent: phenomenology of mind (phenomenology in general) correspond to restricted economy, restricted to commercial values, “science dealing w/ utilization of wealth”: circuit of reproductive consumption, limited to established value of objects and their circulation

RGE.content: absolute production and destruction of value escapes phenomenology as restricted economy
RGE.linkedContent: absolute production and destruction of value escapes phenomenology as restricted economy

RGE.content: Aufhebung: produced entirely w/in system/work of signification, from one infinite determination to the next, each one conserved in the other, transitions produced by anxiety of infinity—included w/in circle of absolute knowledge, never suspends totality of discourse (work, meaning, law), never exceeds its closure > restricted economy, circulation of prohibitions: history as truth of prohibitions
RGE.linkedContent: Aufhebung: produced entirely w/in system/work of signification, from one infinite determination to the next, each one conserved in the other, transitions produced by anxiety of infinity—included w/in circle of absolute knowledge, never suspends totality of discourse (work, meaning, law), never exceeds its closure > restricted economy, circulation of prohibitions: history as truth of prohibitions

Gii.content: [re: Handwerk] w/out attunement to essence of wood, itself attuned to man’s dwelling: empty activity, commerce, taste for profit > (this is Heidegger’s hierarchy & evaluation)
Gii.linkedContent: [re: Handwerk] w/out attunement to essence of wood, itself attuned to man’s dwelling: empty activity, commerce, taste for profit > (this is Heidegger’s hierarchy & evaluation)

Gii.content: Heidegger: typewriter “tears (entreisst) writing from the essential realm of the hand” [MOP]
Gii.linkedContent: Heidegger: typewriter “tears (entreisst) writing from the essential realm of the hand” [MOP]

Gii.content: machine “degrades” word into means of commerce, offers the advantage, for those who enjoy degradation, of dissimulation > Heidegger: “typewriter makes everyone look the same”
Gii.linkedContent: machine “degrades” word into means of commerce, offers the advantage, for those who enjoy degradation, of dissimulation > Heidegger: “typewriter makes everyone look the same”

REST.content: shoes: what are they worth? what does their surplus (or minus-) value signal toward? en quel sens (qui? quoi?) font-elles marcher?
REST.linkedContent: shoes: what are they worth? what does their surplus (or minus-) value signal toward? en quel sens (qui? quoi?) font-elles marcher?

REST.content: there’s a reattachment always, already, in process of retightening the unstrictured > les souliers font marquer (font marcher, font marché-de), shoes make move, make a market, are bigger than the frame ——the detached must also be understood as “representative mission to be reattached to its origin of emission” [father-son]
REST.linkedContent: there’s a reattachment always, already, in process of retightening the unstrictured > les souliers font marquer (font marcher, font marché-de), shoes make move, make a market, are bigger than the frame ——the detached must also be understood as “representative mission to be reattached to its origin of emission” [father-son]

PIO.content: power of closure ensured by economy of the same, not to be rejected, criticized, combatted > economic circle of invention reappropriates what it sets in motion, the differance of the other (which can’t be reduced to meaning, truth, existence)
PIO.linkedContent: power of closure ensured by economy of the same, not to be rejected, criticized, combatted > economic circle of invention reappropriates what it sets in motion, the differance of the other (which can’t be reduced to meaning, truth, existence)

AFR.content: for Condillac, arbitrariness of sign makes commerce freer and more extensive: commerce rescues man from relation to present object only > thus, the proper, property of sign, is system of the arbitrary; Condillac: “until commerce, natural signs are not at all properly signs”
AFR.linkedContent: for Condillac, arbitrariness of sign makes commerce freer and more extensive: commerce rescues man from relation to present object only > thus, the proper, property of sign, is system of the arbitrary; Condillac: “until commerce, natural signs are not at all properly signs”

IW.content: [vis-à-vis Rosenzweig, Cohen] system cannot be given, forbids or reappropriates the gift in advance (in a circular manner) > most generous gift: give to think beyond system
IW.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rosenzweig, Cohen] system cannot be given, forbids or reappropriates the gift in advance (in a circular manner) > most generous gift: give to think beyond system

WOG.content: the remainder (of all ontology) and the contamination btwn tout autre and its regular reappropriation (economic redialectization) haunts all Derrida’s essays on the Greeks
WOG.linkedContent: the remainder (of all ontology) and the contamination btwn tout autre and its regular reappropriation (economic redialectization) haunts all Derrida’s essays on the Greeks

OG.content: mute sign is sign of liberty when it is immediate, no detour, no anonymity (the expresser and expressed are properly present), mute sign is sign of slavery when re-presentative mediacy invades system (abyss of circulation sans fin, no one there for anyone, not even himself) > presuming speech opened this abyss, Rousseau tempted to return to archeological moment of sign w/out speech
OG.linkedContent: mute sign is sign of liberty when it is immediate, no detour, no anonymity (the expresser and expressed are properly present), mute sign is sign of slavery when re-presentative mediacy invades system (abyss of circulation sans fin, no one there for anyone, not even himself) > presuming speech opened this abyss, Rousseau tempted to return to archeological moment of sign w/out speech

FV.content: Derrida on Lacan: circulation, acquitting of a debt, a proper place [not naive, empirical topology], detour from [woman’s] hole to itself permits signified to return to its origin—indivisible locality, signifier must never be lost, divided, fragmented
FV.linkedContent: Derrida on Lacan: circulation, acquitting of a debt, a proper place [not naive, empirical topology], detour from [woman’s] hole to itself permits signified to return to its origin—indivisible locality, signifier must never be lost, divided, fragmented

FV.content: circular itinerary [Lacan’s Poe], Dupin & analyst find letter where they expect it: Queen wants letter-fetish brought back to her, exchanges one fetish for another w/out spending—because there’s equivalence here (assurance of return): circle of restricted economy, stricture of the ring
FV.linkedContent: circular itinerary [Lacan’s Poe], Dupin & analyst find letter where they expect it: Queen wants letter-fetish brought back to her, exchanges one fetish for another w/out spending—because there’s equivalence here (assurance of return): circle of restricted economy, stricture of the ring

FV.content: castration-truth is that which contracts itself (stricture of the ring): brings signifier, fetish, phallus, letter back into their oikos, familiar dwelling, proper place
FV.linkedContent: castration-truth is that which contracts itself (stricture of the ring): brings signifier, fetish, phallus, letter back into their oikos, familiar dwelling, proper place

FV.content: the lack never lacks a place: indivisible circulation of proper
FV.linkedContent: the lack never lacks a place: indivisible circulation of proper

FV.content: lack does not have its place in dissemination
FV.linkedContent: lack does not have its place in dissemination

FV.content: for Lacan, Femininity is the Truth (of) castration, best figure of castration, because in logic of signifier it (elle) has always already been castrated > Femininity “leaves” something in circulation (here the letter), detaches something she never had, brought back to itself
FV.linkedContent: for Lacan, Femininity is the Truth (of) castration, best figure of castration, because in logic of signifier it (elle) has always already been castrated > Femininity “leaves” something in circulation (here the letter), detaches something she never had, brought back to itself

FV.content: this 1st castration (pre-castration) affects w/ castration/femininity whoever holds the letter
FV.linkedContent: this 1st castration (pre-castration) affects w/ castration/femininity whoever holds the letter

FV.content: circulation, always circulation of truth: toward truth, cause & effect of circle, causa sui, proper course (trajet) and destiny of letter > truth as cause (Ursache)
FV.linkedContent: circulation, always circulation of truth: toward truth, cause & effect of circle, causa sui, proper course (trajet) and destiny of letter > truth as cause (Ursache)
